name: Soul Cards
description: This new world presents it self as a new challenge for judgement, the cards find your hand. The cards form a deck in this world, drawing and shuffling on there own to help you through the competition of life.

badges.text:
§b§lSoul Cards §r§b♠§r

§7You can draw a card that offers a movement ability every 7s.
Each card has different amounts of bullets for your abilites/gun to use and once bullets are empty, you either auto-draw or go back to neutral.
§eELEVATE§7
§8(COST: 3 Ammo)
§7Dash forward. If middair, you are launched upwards.

§5PURIFY§7
§8(COST: 15 Ammo)
§7Throw a grenade that deals damage. The grenade deals no damage to you and pushes you away.

§9GODSPEED§8
(COST: 2 Ammo)
§7Teleport 10 blocks forward; dealing damage to entities in your way.

§aSTOMP§8
(Cost: 20 Ammo/s)
§7Float upwards; crashing down and dealing damage in an AOE once the Ammo bar is depleted.

§7§lActive Ability
